    public class TestRestoreSnapshotHelper
extends Object
    Test the restore/clone operation from a file-system point of view.

        private void testRestore(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path snapshotDir,
                         org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.SnapshotProtos.SnapshotDescription sd,
                         org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TableDescriptor htdClone)
                  throws IOException
        Execute the restore operation
        参数:
        snapshotDir - The snapshot directory to use as "restore source"
        sd - The snapshot descriptor
        htdClone - The HTableDescriptor of the table to restore/clone.
        抛出:
        IOException
